short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to perform object detection on any shared screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Real-Time Object Detection for Video Feeds

This Chrome extension brings computer vision technology directly to your browser. It empowers you to analyze and monitor your video feeds without compromising your personal data. You can use it on any CCTV feed that you receive in your browser.

Features:
Instant Object Detection: you can seamlessly share any screen containing a video feed and instantly detect objects in real-time. Select an object of interest from an intuitive dropdown menu, and this extension will highlight its presence within the video.

Private and Secure: Your video feeds remain exactly that—yours. The extension performs all object detection computations within your browser, meaning your data is never sent to external servers. This ensures complete privacy and security, allowing you to confidently use the extension in any setting.

Seamless Screen Integration: Video Object Detection integrates smoothly with your Chrome browser, allowing you to share and analyze any screen with a video feed. Whether it’s a live stream, a recorded video, or a conference call, Video Object Detection is your go-to tool for real-time object detection.

No Data Collection: Video Object Detection is built with privacy at its core. All processing happens locally in your browser, ensuring that no personal data, video feeds, or object detection results are ever collected, stored, or transmitted.

Simple, Intuitive Interface: Video Object detection is designed for ease of use. Its clean, user-friendly interface makes it accessible to everyone, regardless of technical expertise. You can start detecting objects in your video feeds with just a few clicks.
